obs.ontologyAccess.bean
Class BioPortalLightOntologyBean

java.lang.Object
  obs.ontologyAccess.bean.BioPortalLightOntologyBean
Direct Known Subclasses:
BioPortalFullOntologyBean
public class BioPortalLightOntologyBean
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a JavaBean representation of a light ontology bean returned by BioPortal. This bean are created by hitting the URL: http://rest.bioontology.org/bioportal/rest/ontologies
This URL returns only the latest version of the ontology in BioPortal.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Clement Jonquet
